animeDescription: Even as he tries to keep the student council president out of trouble, Vice President Chiga-kun finds himself being drawn to the president's strength and power. Chiga-kun wonders how he, being such an intelligent individual, can be so unwillingly taken with a boy who is so country and simple...(Source: Aarinfantasy)
animeStaff: [['Kawakubo, Keiji', 'Director'], ['Monchi, Kaori', 'Original Creator'], ['Abe, Nobuyuki', 'Sound Manager'], ['Suzuki, Eri', 'Color Design']]
